item.title: Protest, Unrest and Social Upheaval in New Delhi
item.author: Devang Mehta,
item.description: On the 16th of December last year while Bangladesh celebrated its 39th Victory Day and Japanese voters brought about a change in government, a 23-year-old physiotherapy student was brutally raped and assaulted in the Indian capital, New Delhi. Within a week as news of the vicious attack spread â€¦
